articles.title: China records first H3N8 bird flu death, WHO says - The Guardian
articles.description: Three cases of H3N8 detected in China since 2022 as WHO says strain doesn’t appear to spread easily between humans
articles.content:
A woman has died from H3N8 bird flu in China, the World Health Organization reported the first known human fatality from the avian influenza strain.
